resources.string:
In this test, you will see a grid in which 3 dots will appear. Your task is that to memorize the location of the 3 dots. You only have 15s max to remember the location.
 After that, you will see a 5*9 grid with Fs and Es, you task is to find all the Es and touch them.
 Finally, you will see a blank grid without any dot, your task is to touch the location of the 3 dots you see at the first trail.
 Good luck!
